name: Solitaire Treasure Hunt
description:
Solitaire Treasure Hunt

Dream of pyramids and paradise as you blast to the peak. Make your own saga!

Don't expect a fairway! Treasure hunting is wild. Dream of pyramids and paradise as you blast cards and reach the peak of adventure. Make your own saga and become a legendary explorer!

Take Solitaire to new depths by facing off against opposition from all over the world. Live for the hunt as you race to beat your opponents to the greatest treasures in history. This is Classic Solitaire with an exciting new twist.

Travel through history and explore iconic locations while taking on all other treasure hunters and tomb raiders to claim the title of the best treasure hunter the world has ever seen.

Top features:

◆ 4v4 and 8v8 Tournaments
◆ Exciting Solitaire gameplay
◆ Head to Head battle
◆ Hundreds of amazing handcrafted levels
◆ Beautiful treasures
◆ Country and Global Leaderboards
